tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)

comments: by far the most difficult worse professor for a gen ed class theres so much work. i dont mind the work but all of her work requires so much effort and deep thinking. it\'s a gen ed class we dont have time to devote 10 hours to do projects on pointless shakespeare stuff

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: She\'s extremely knowledgeable in theater history. Likes to talk but is open to listen to what students have to say. LOVES to spark controversial convos. But on five separate occasions she didn\'t show for class, and either gave a 30-15 minute warning, or would email the class 4-6 minutes after class. That sucked. Good teacher but not professional.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)
comments: she is awful- makes you watch the 2 hour film on your own time and gives a quiz EVERY SINGLE CLASS... so you cant miss ONE class? you have 2 VERY ANALYTICAL group projects that actually require a great deal of effort. all for a gen-ed class. RELAX no one actually cares about this- its a GEN-ED! oh and a 5 page SINGLE SPACED paper as a final.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)

comments: this class was the worst- she gives a pop quiz every class, you have a group project which she demands everyone to be super creative in and she wants some serious film analyis and acts like everyone should understand shakespeare with NO problems- THIS IS A GEN-ED. chill out. oh and you have a 5 page SINGLE SPACED paper- all for a GEN ED

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Very condescending in nature. If she doesn\'t like your work, you\'re totally at the mercy of her grading. She gives quizzes every week which can\'t be made up. She tries to be approachable, but talking to her constantly feels like being yelled at. If she doesn\'t like you, prepare to fail. You may not need a book, but the anguish isn\'t worth it.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: I have a lot to say about this professor. I wouldnt recommend her. She never let\'s you miss class because she gives pop quizzes every class period (im not exaggerating, i wish i was). Miss a class, you won\'t passs. better be prepared to be smart or you will be looked down upon.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)
comments: Amazing teacher! Brenna is so open-minded, funny, talented, quirky, cool, and down to earth. This class actually made me feel enlightened and refreshed everyday because of her approach to teaching. She really cares about you and guides you through the material in a fun way. Can\'t say enough good things about her, take her if you get the chance!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Tough Grader (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Participation matters (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)
comments: She is a very kind, very interesting teacher. Since the class is about creativity, a lot is based on discussion. You are given broad assignments that are up to your own interpretation. This is a class, and a teacher, that is very worth taking.
